Headline: Cities around the world with the most happening nightlifeReduce long visa wait time in India: Indian travel industry to the USAt a recent tourism and hospitality summit, long visa wait times and limited direct flight options were identified as major obstacles to travel between India and the US. Despite a reduction from a peak of 999 days, wait times for US visitor visas still exceed a year in India. The travel industry has called for further reductions in these delays. Republican-led states sue Biden Administration for immigration plan to help spouses who are in the US illegallySixteen Republican-led states, led by Texas, sued the Biden administration over a new immigration program. The lawsuit argued that the program exceeds executive authority, while the White House called it politically motivated. The program aims to grant legal status to undocumented spouses of U.S. citizens and promote family unity.
